title: Projects / Case Studies
text:
Oversaw daily operations and managed staff performance at Carlton Tower Jumeirah, a prestigious luxury hotel in London.
Implemented high standards of guest service and operational efficiency.
Applied financial analysis, budgeting, and cost control to improve department outcomes.
Developed leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment.







Group Photo


More projects and case studies can be added as you complete your MBA journey.

title: Home / About
text:
Profile Photo


Sokhibjon Otabaev
I am an Accounting and Management graduate currently pursuing a Master of Business Administration (MBA). My academic journey has equipped me with a strong foundation in business strategy, finance, and organizational leadership, enhancing my analytical and decision-making skills.



BSc Hons Accounting and Management, University of Ulster (2019–2022)
MBA, University Canada West (2024–2026)




Supervisor, Food and Beverage Department Carlton Tower Jumeirah, London (2022–2024)

Oversaw daily operations and staff performance in a prestigious luxury hotel.
Maintained high standards of guest service and operational efficiency.
Developed leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment.
